title: Build contact management app with invite links, QR codes, and username search

requirements.text: Create a backend user registry that stores user profiles with unique usernames and contact information
acceptanceCriteria: Each user has a unique username that can be used for lookup
User profiles are persisted in stable storage
Username searches return matching user profiles

requirements.text: Implement backend logic to generate shareable invite links for users to add contacts
acceptanceCriteria: Each user can generate a unique invite link
Invite links can be validated and used to establish contact connections
Accepting an invite link adds both users to each other's contact lists

requirements.text: Implement backend contact management system that allows users to maintain a personal contact list
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add contacts to their personal list
Users can view their complete contact list
Users can remove contacts from their list
Contact relationships are persisted in stable storage

requirements.text: Create a username search interface that allows users to find and add contacts by entering usernames
acceptanceCriteria: Search input field for entering usernames
Search results display matching user profiles
Users can add found contacts directly from search results
Search provides feedback for no results or errors

requirements.text: Build an invite link sharing interface where users can generate and copy their personal invite link
acceptanceCriteria: Users can generate their unique invite link
Copy-to-clipboard functionality for invite links
Visual confirmation when link is copied
Users can accept invite links shared by others

requirements.text: Implement QR code generation for user profiles that encode invite information
acceptanceCriteria: Each user profile generates a unique QR code
QR code encodes the user's invite information
QR code is visually displayed and can be downloaded

requirements.text: Create a QR code scanner interface that allows users to scan QR codes from other users to add them as contacts
acceptanceCriteria: Camera access for scanning QR codes
Real-time QR code detection and decoding
Automatic contact addition upon successful QR scan
Error handling for invalid or unreadable QR codes

requirements.text: Build a contacts list view that displays all saved contacts with their usernames and profile information
acceptanceCriteria: List displays all user contacts
Each contact shows username and relevant profile details
List updates automatically when contacts are added or removed
Empty state shown when no contacts exist

requirements.text: Design a clean, modern interface with a cohesive visual theme featuring warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream), rounded corners, and friendly typography that makes contact management feel approachable and intuitive
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all screens
Typography hierarchy that enhances readability
Rounded UI elements that create a friendly feel
Cohesive design language throughout the application

constraints: Must not attempt to access device contacts directly
Must not implement real-time messaging features
QR code scanning must work within browser constraints

required: Friendly contact icon illustration with warm earth tones showing two people connecting (contacts-hero.dim_400x300.png)
QR code placeholder icon in terracotta color (qr-placeholder.dim_128x128.png)
Search icon in sage green color (search-icon.dim_64x64.png)
